metadata.name: Powershell Suspicious Win32_PnPEntity
metadata.comment: Adversaries may attempt to gather information about attached peripheral devices and components connected to a computer system.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('win32_pnpentity')))

output.summary: Adversaries may attempt to gather information about attached peripheral devices and components connected to a computer system.
